pos_mean_info_list.mean: 需要努力的；显示努力的；充满努力的

word_group.brief_definition: 努力做某事
不遗余力, 尽最大努力
努力；下功夫

毫不费力, 轻松地
做出努力；付出努力；作出努力

竭尽全力；尽力；全力以赴
协力；共同努力；协同努力
巨大努力；极大努力
特别努力
主要努力
尽力；最大努力；全力
持续努力；不断努力；正在努力
救济工作；救灾努力；救济努力
战争时期作出的努力
改革的努力；改革工作；改革
自觉的努力；有意识的努力

bilingual.source: She put in a lot of effort.
The government is making a great effort to improve.
His father made a determined effort to quit smoking.
I could see the effort when looking at the details.
bilingual.target: 我可以从细节中看到努力。

bilingual.source: The paralympic athlete has to put in great effort.
bilingual.target: 残奥运动员必须付出巨大努力。

bilingual.source: These three things are friendship, effort and trust.
bilingual.target: 这三件事是友谊、努力和信任。

bilingual.source: After a great deal of effort, she finally succeeded.
bilingual.target: 经过一番努力，她终于成功了。

bilingual.source: Ned needs to make an effort to improve his handwriting.
bilingual.target: 内德需要努力提高他的书写。

bilingual.source: Teachers, parents, and students need to value effort, not intelligence.
bilingual.target: 老师、家长和学生需要重视努力，而不是智力。

bilingual.source: I make an effort to be on time when I meet my friends.
bilingual.target: 我见朋友时会努力准时。

list.abstract: effort，英文单词，名词，翻译为工作、努力、尝试、成就等。
金正宇（Kim Jung Woo，1991年1月30日-），韩国星际争霸职业玩家，游戏ID：Effort，被称为“不死鸟”“火星大王”。 其打法灵动多变，操作极强，职业生涯曾先后获得暴雪嘉年华Blizzcon 2009星际争霸世界冠军，大韩航空OSL2010冠军，SK Planet ProLeague 11-12 Season2 总决赛MVP等诸多荣誉。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. I don't get it. You said make an effort. Here I am, making an effort.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我搞不懂了。明明是你叫我要努力的。现在我来努力了啊。

yingyinNormal.en: And I appreciate your effort, but upon contemplation, I decided I was being selfish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我感谢你的努力，但仔细一想，我觉得自己太自私了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, after much concerted effort, Maya finally made it into Brody Jenner's cell phone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 经过漫长的努力，马雅终于和布鲁迪·珍娜交往了。

yingyinNormal.en: And more importantly, it becomes powerful to come together in common purpose and common effort.
yingyinNormal.zh: 更重要的是，凭借共同的目的与共同的努力，它将变得更为强大。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, Amy. It's nice to see you. Nice to see you, too. And that's how you make effort look effortless.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾米，你好呀。你也好呀。这就是怎么让努力看起来不会太用力。

yingyinNormal.en: Jim's new approach takes more time, energy, and rehearsal, but it's been well worth the effort.
yingyinNormal.zh: Jim的新方法虽然花上了比较多时间、经历和练习，但是一切的努力都是值得的。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'm saying that you can make an effort and get it, it can be done and I'm living proof of that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而我说，你可以努力，可以理解他们，是的，可以做到，我就是活生生的例子。

yingyinNormal.en: We've attempted to save our marriage, but after great effort, I've come to the conclusion that it can't be saved.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们曾企图挽救我们的婚姻，但虽经过很多努力，我最终认识到我们的婚姻已不可挽救。

yingyinNormal.en: No one said anything of the kind to Neil Armstrong. The entire nation dedicated a decade of effort and treasure to put a man on the moon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没人对阿姆斯特朗说过这样的话，为了送一个人上月球整个国家做出了十年的努力。

yingyinNormal.en: After all that effort most of the students still struggle to speak comfortably with natives and don't have perfect pronunciation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 经过那么多努力，许多学生还是在和英语奋斗，无法自信地和外国人对话，也没有完美发音。

yingyinNormal.en: I think in any healthy relationship, or friendship, or marriage, isn't it important for both sides to make an effort to understand the other?
yingyinNormal.zh: 在任何一个健康的关系中，在友谊，在婚姻中，双方不是都要努力去理解对方的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And on Tuesday, I called on every nation developed and developing alike to join us in this effort for the sake of future generations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在周二，我呼吁每一个国家不管是发达国家，还是发展中国家，加入我们致力于为了子孙后代的努力。

yingyinNormal.en: We have both put a great deal of effort and thought into how to handle Russia. I'd like for this to be a decision we make together, instead of an impulsive response.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们对如果处理俄罗斯都耗尽心思和努力。我希望这次我们能共同做决定,而不是冲动地回应……

yingyinNormal.en: And if we take the steps that are necessary, if we're guided by the science, the facts, not fear, then I am absolutely confident that we can prevent a serious outbreak here in the United States and we can continue to lead the world in this urgent effort.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们采取必要的步骤，如果我们遵循科学，是事实，而不是恐惧，我特别充满信心，我们可以避免它在美国很严重地爆发，我们能够继续领导世界进行这一紧迫的努力。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, dinner's ready. Good game. Yeah.Yeah. Solid effort. Solid effort.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，晚餐准备好了。好吧。真的很精彩。

yingyinNormal.en: This is an effort that America has the unique ability to lead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是美国完全有能力领导的行动。

yingyinNormal.en: Objection! All in an effort to prove your clients were innocent?
yingyinNormal.zh: 反对！就为了证明你当事人的清白？

yingyinNormal.en: It was a team effort. Who is your source? I can't. You know that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是团队合作的成果，是谁告诉你的？我不能透露，你懂的。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sure it's been difficult for you, with all of the effort you put in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想你一定很不好受，毕竟你投入了那么多心血。

yingyinNormal.en: I intend to insist in the effort to reestablish communication with Starfleet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我坚持继续尝试重建与星舰的联络系统。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 努力; 尝试; 试图

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 努力; 尝试; 试图

examination_example.sentence: It requires minimal <highlight>effort</highlight> and goes a long way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这只需要最小的努力，却有很大的作用。

examination_example.sentence: The policy follows similar <highlight>efforts</highlight> from other journals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该政策遵循了其他期刊的类似尝试。

examination_example.sentence: However, because these connections are made through <highlight>effort</highlight> and practice, scientists believe that intelligence can expand and fluctuate according to mental <highlight>effort</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，因为这些连接是通过努力和练习而形成的，所以科学家认为智力能够通过思维锻炼而发展和波动。

sense_info_list.en: a particular activity that a group of people organize in order to achieve something

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>effort</highlight> was a collective one and involved other companies as well as a Swedish university.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一次集体的行动，其他公司和一所瑞典的大学都参与到了其中。

examination_example.sentence: Antipoverty <highlight>efforts</highlight> require the participation of local farmers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 扶贫工作需要当地农民的参与。

sense_info_list.en: the result of an attempt to do something

sample.mean: n. 结果；作用；影响；效果；财产；财物；程度；效力；感受

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: At other times, they may disagree with the spirit of the procedure—the <highlight>effort</highlight> demanded, the time consumed, the lack of potential effectiveness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在其他时候，他们可能不同意程序的精神——所需的努力、所消耗的时间、缺乏潜在的有效性。

examination_example.sentence: It fostered a willingness to dedicate their <highlight>effort</highlight> and ability to their work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这培养了他们将自己的努力和能力奉献给工作的意愿。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>efforts</highlight> of millions of drivers to get ahead do not miraculously produce a situation in which everyone does better than before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数以百万计的司机为求发展所做的努力并没有奇迹般地产生一个人人都比以前做得好的局面。

examination_example.sentence: Other <highlight>efforts</highlight> to increase the use of electric vehicles include plans to build over 1 million hybrid.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他努力增加电动汽车使用的措施包括: 计划在全国建立超过100万个混合动力。

sense_info_list.en: a series of actions advancing a principle or tending toward a particular end

sample.mean: n. 结果；作用；影响；效果；财产；财物；程度；效力；感受

n. 防御工事；防御城墙；设防；筑城；筑垒

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 做出努力；付出努力；作出努力

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It takes great <highlight>efforts</highlight> for children to grasp the concept of number words.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于孩子来说，掌握数词的概念需要很大的努力。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>effort</highlight> was worthwhile.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 努力是值得的。

examination_example.sentence: Crow funding can be part of researcher's <highlight>efforts</highlight> to reach the public, and people give because "they feel a connection to the person" who is doing the fundraising-not necessarily to the science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 众筹可以成为研究人员与公众接触的努力的一部分，人们捐款是因为“他们感觉到了与募捐者的联系”，而不一定是与科学有关。

sense_info_list.en: a series of actions advancing a principle or tending toward a particular end

examination_example.sentence: Food-import anxiety is even leading to new <highlight>efforts</highlight> by food-importing countries to buy or lease farmland in other countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于对粮食进口的担忧，甚至导致粮食进口国在其他国家购买或租赁农田。

examination_example.sentence: Those are a few of the traits of successful science crowd funding <highlight>efforts</highlight> that emerge from a recent study that examined nearly 400 campaigns, But having a large network and some promotional skis may be more crucial.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的一项研究对近400项活动进行了调查，结果显示这些是成功的科学众筹活动的一些特征。但是拥有一个庞大的数据网络和一些推广技巧可能更为重要。

sample.mean: n. 结果；作用；影响；效果；财产；财物；程度；效力；感受

sample.mean: n. 舒适；自在；安慰；慰藉；温暖的盖被；安逸；享受；带来舒适安逸的事物；给予安慰（或减轻困难）的人
n. 防御工事；防御城墙；设防；筑城；筑垒
v. 筑防御工事于；设防于；使强壮；鼓舞；增加酒精含量；提高…的营养价值
n. 坚韧；刚毅

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Why is art still so widely considered to be a waste of time and <highlight>effort</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么艺术仍然被普遍认为是浪费时间和精力呢？

examination_example.sentence: You don't have to always get everything right the first time and that good things come with continual <highlight>effort</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不必总是在第一次就把每件事都做好，好事情是伴随着不断的努力而来的。

examination_example.sentence: Whether you're looking at wallpaper or paint, the time, <highlight>effort</highlight> and relative expense put into it are significant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管你是在看墙纸还是油漆，花在上面的时间、精力和相关费用都是很重要的。

sense_info_list.en: a series of actions advancing a principle or tending toward a particular end

examination_example.sentence: "It's good to know there's still someone who cares enough to go to that kind of trouble," says Lisa of Ehlers' rescue <highlight>effort</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在谈到Ehlers的救助工作时，Lisa说：“很高兴知道还有人在意这种麻烦事。”

sample.mean: n. 结果；作用；影响；效果；财产；财物；程度；效力；感受

n. 坚韧；刚毅

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 做出巨大努力；巨大的努力；十分努力

examination_example.sentence: As a party member, he makes an <highlight>effort</highlight> to serve people without thinking about himself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为一名党员，他努力为人民服务而不考虑自己。

examination_example.sentence: According to the passage, Marianne made an <highlight>effort</highlight> to find the best stories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据文章，玛丽安努力寻找最好的故事。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Effort</highlight> is very important when you are in trouble.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你遇到困难时，努力是非常重要的。

sample.mean: n. 结果；作用；影响；效果；财产；财物；程度；效力；感受

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 出来, 从...离开, 从...向外
